actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Highways, Transit and Pipelines

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a project to widen Interstate Route 35 East in Denton County, Texas.
short_title: North Texas Mobility Improvement Act of 2003

summary.text: North Texas Mobility Improvement Act of 2003 - Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a project to widen from 4 to 6 lanes Interstate Route 35 East between Farm-to-Market Road 2181 and Lake Lewisville in Denton County, Texas.

titles.title: North Texas Mobility Improvement Act of 2003
To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a project to widen Interstate Route 35 East in Denton County, Texas.
